title: News24.com | FULL SPEECH | 'We must not give up now': Ramaphosa announces phased reopening of economy from 1 May
description: We have decided SA should begin a gradual and phased recovery of economic activity, President Cyril Ramaphosa said in his address to the nation on Thursday night. Read his full speech.
content:
